subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Khalid Khannouchi, who has twice broken the world record in the marathon, yesterday joined the field for Saturday’s Healthy Kidney 10-kilometer run in Central Park. He has never raced in the park.Khannouchi, 35, was born in Morocco, moved to Brooklyn in 1993 and lives in Ossining, N.Y. He became an American citizen in 2000. He set world marathon records of 2 hours 5 minutes 42 seconds in Chicago in 1999 and 2:05:38 in London in 2002. He has been slowed by foot injuries in recent years.
